channel.title: Help with SocketException
channel.description:
Hi, everytime i logout its writing in server's console:
java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: socket write error at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketOutputStream.write(Unknown Source) at client.run(client.java:922) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
How to solve it? Thanks

item.title: Help with SocketException
item.dc:creator: @alongu alongu
item.description:
